Act of the Synod of Lothian and Tweeddale, anent the observation of a fast, with the causes thereof. Edinburgh the sixth day of May 1698 years post meridiem. Church of Scotland. Synod of Lothian and Tweeddale.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty, Edinburgh : 1698.
Caption title. Signed at end: Extracted by Jo. Sandilands Cls. Syn. Pr. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
